results.title: Supermarket
results.brief_description: A look at how a large independently owned supermarket is run. Although an American store is shown, the differences between its operation and that of an Australian supermarket are minor.

results.title: Sunshine province
results.brief_description: Presents Nelson, New Zealand’s sunshine province, settled in 1841. Shows Nelson’s sporting and tourist activities: public historical buildings, sightseeing, golfing, surf beach as well as Nelson’s agricultural industries including tobacco growing and apple orchards.

results.title: Successful staff selection: the employment interview
results.brief_description: An illustration of how the manager prepares for, and handles, an interview to assess a candidate for a particular job. Job specifications, unobtrusive control of the form of the interview, handling stress on the candidate, etc. are related to a full length simulated interview for a job.

results.title: Substantial shadows
results.brief_description: An elegant, silent meditation on different light forms as they emerge from and transform different obscure, shadowy environments. A miner’s torch flickers across the walls of a cave, a candle flame flickers in a shadow dance, a bonfire blazes in the darkness, a trail of artificial lights illuminate a kitsch architectural structure. Creating a montage that takes its rhythms from the waxing and waning motions of the different light sources Austrian artist Lisl Ponger proposes a playful and poetic contemplation of light and shadow and their qualities when captured as cinematic images.

results.title: subscape_PROOF
results.brief_description:
Traditionally, western cartography combines multiple data sets in a two dimensional representation. The datamapping (cross-referencing of datasets) tells a story - the land use and landforms of a place. Imaginative and politicised choice of datasets creates more esoteric ‘maps’.

sub_scapePROOF uses video/audio footage of televised political rhetoric and confessional TV shows. Onto these are mapped other sources of ‘data’ generated from philosophical and poetic texts.

sub_scapePROOF critiques the notion of evidential, superficial ‘truth’, in a post-faith age. By mapping data from post-colonial locations back onto the language of superpower politics, sub_scape generates a playful and ironic critique on the traditional politics and power dynamics of knowledge-through-mapping.
- Waterson and Richards.

results.title: Study of a 2,100 year old corpse
results.brief_description: In 1972 a Chinese archaeological dig excavated the tomb of a woman who had been buried for 2,100 years. The body was so well preserved that many different scientific teams were requested to dissect and examine it to determine what it could reveal about ancient Chinese civilisation. With English commentary and subtitles.

results.title: Strong and safe
results.brief_description: A program focusing on IV users and HIV issues in the prison environment. Presents information on cleaning needles/syringes, obtaining new needles and syringes, and safe sexual practices by using humorous narrators - “Bleachman” and “Condomware Woman”! Messages are promoted in a positive, simple and practical manner and are geared to reinforcing safe injecting and sexual practices as they relate to IV drug use and the potential transmission of HIV within a prison oriented context.

results.title: Stroke: the fight back
results.brief_description: Gives careful advice on how to care for stroke victims, such as encouraging daily muscle control pertaining to daily independence with the aid of a visiting nurse, physiotherapist, occupational therapist, speech therapy, medical social worker.
